title.bibl: Unidentified newspaper clipping (probably Novoye Russkoye Slovo, May 23, 1923) in the Scrapbook, Vol. X, of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. The Society of Workers in the Arts (O R I)

div.bibl: Unidentified newspaper clipping (probably Novoye Russkoye Slovo, May 23, 1923) in the Scrapbook, Vol. X, of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. THE SOCIETY OF WORKERS IN THE ARTS (O R I)

body.p: This society had been organized sometime earlier, the correspondent says. It formed a dramatic, musical, literary, art, and other sections. It had held a couple of meetings and talked much, but some months had passed and nothing had come of it.
